tasks.instruction: Analyze the user's current project screenshots at /workspace/uploads/Screenshot 2025-08-28 at 4.50.16 PM.png, /workspace/uploads/Screenshot 2025-08-28 at 4.50.11 PM.png, /workspace/uploads/Screenshot 2025-08-28 at 1.10.30 PM.png, and /workspace/uploads/Screenshot 2025-08-28 at 4.51.30 PM.png to understand their current project structure and UI. Then provide a detailed file-by-file update guide that maps their existing files to the enhanced modern dashboard components we created. Include specific file paths they need to update, what changes to make in each file, and how to integrate the modern design system (colors, styling, components) into their existing codebase.
